alert.note: Alert for Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 7:19PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Pima County through 800 PM MST... At 717 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm outflow near Davis-Monthan Air Force Base, moving west at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and brief reduction in visibility due to blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated and spotter reports. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tucson, Oro Valley, Marana, Sahuarita, Davis-Monthan Air Force Base, Casas Adobes, Drexel Heights, Flowing Wells, Tanque Verde, Vail, South Tucson, Pascua Pueblo Yaqui Reservation, East Sahuarita, Sabino Canyon Recreation Area, Summit, Valencia West, Saguaro National Park East, Catalina State Park, Catalina Foothills and Corona De Tucson. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 between mile markers 249 and 287. Interstate 19 between mile markers 45 and 63. Route 77 between mile markers 70 and 83. Route 83 between mile markers 51 and 58. Route 86 between mile markers 163 and 171. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
